'''Potato oil''' is a joke potion that provides [[It's very slippery]] when used.

== Obtaining ==
Potato oil can be obtained via [[commands]], and is also available in the [[Creative inventory]].{{verify|Is it really unavailable in survival mode?}}

=== Brewing ===
While the base potato oil cannot be obtained via [[brewing]],{{verify}} it can still be brewed into a splash potion or a lingering potion.

{{Brewing
|head=1
|Gunpowder
|base = Potato Oil (Potion)
|Splash Potato Oil
|name = Splash Potato Oil
}}
{{Brewing
|Dragon's Breath
|base = Splash Potato Oil
|Lingering Potato Oil
|name = Lingering Potato Oil
|ingredients = [[Dragon's Breath]] +<br> '''Splash Potato Oil'''
|foot=1
}}
